name: Cursed Squire
description:
Keyboard: Left, Right, Space, E

Gamepad: Left Joystick, A, X

A powerful sorcerer kidnaps a princess and the only hope for her rescue is a squire that was cursed by the sorcerer. The only tool available is the ability to trap the sorcerers minions in slime

Cursed Squire is a game that I developed to propose to my fiancee. 

  • Programming by @tekuzo
  • Music by celestialghost8
  • Sound Effects by @Shades
  • Special Thanks to ClockworkRook
